newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish bourse kerb bond deals - December 4.
newsitem.headline: Polish bourse kerb bond deals - December 4.

text.p: Turnover in kerb trade through the Warsaw Stock Exchange was at 4.1 million zlotys on Wednesday.
The following is a summary of the day's block transactions on the Warsaw bourse.
* 1,000 fixed-interest five-year bonds maturing on June 12, 2001 traded at 81.00 zlotys.
* 2,000 fixed-interest five-year bonds maturing on October 12, 2001 traded at 81.45 zlotys.
* 15,000 variable-interest three-year bonds maturing on November 6, 1998 traded at 101.5 zlotys.
